Information From the Restaurant Offers
Description: Tommy's Red Hot is a Hot Dogs , American , and Fast Food restaurant where most Menuism users came for a meal on the go and paid less than $10 . Tags: Hot Dogs, Beef, American, Fast Food, Burgers, Pizza, Good For Kids, and Takeout Stats: 1 dish entered by diners at Tommy's Red Hot

Reviews for Tommy's Red Hot Write a review 2 reviews First reviewed by kwst8ofmind
"I work with cops, so you know I will know the good places"
9 helpful votes over 11 reviews kwst8ofmind 11 Restaurant Reviews +9
Add as friend Send Msg Tommy's Red Hot kwst8ofmind February 18, 2009 2.0 2.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Just a hot dog place
Upon entering you see handwritten signs of what they offer. Appears disorganized. People taking orders don’t or won’t speak good English. Atmosphere is very lacking and unattended. Charge for drink refills. Hot dogs, Sausages, Pizza Puffs,Beefs onion rings, fries, typical hot dog joint. Nothing to write home about.
Dishes I tried:
Hot Dog
2.0 star rating
Poor assembled hot dog, did not get what I ordered on it. Fries were cold. Link To Review

What do you think? Reply or write your own review . Reply: Login or join with Facebook to reply to this restaurant review. Login to Reply Patricia W from Insider Pages
August 27, 2006
2 star rating
CANT RECOMMEND
I have given this newer location many a chance, and every time I come up disappointed. The food is not as good, and the service is surly. I have actually had an order taker tell me how I needed to word my order so she could understand…
